data: December 1918 | British Cavalry Division | Cologne | Hôtel Nationale | Berne

In the month of December 1918, and on the very day that a British Cavalry Division marched into Cologne, with flags flying and bands playing as the conquerors of a beaten nation, the manager of the Hôtel Nationale in Berne received a letter.
Bull-dog Drummond: The Adventures of a Demobilised Officer Who Found Peace Dull
